Container.Name: LibreY
Container.Overview: A fork of LibreX, a framework- and JavaScript-free privacy respecting meta search engine, giving you results from Google, Qwant, Ahmia and popular torrent sites without spying on you. LibreY changed some features like automatic redirection. [br] See documentation for all available settings: https://github.com/Ahwxorg/LibreY/tree/main/docker#environment-variables-that-can-be-set-in-the-docker-container
Container.Category: Network:Privacy Security: Cloud: Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
